casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Delroy MCPHERSON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2016

Justin R. Clark, in support of the petition.

Toni M. Smith-Rosario, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 100, 148 A.3d 630 (2016), is denied.
